sourceMeaningMnemonic: Your <radical>fingers</radical> give you a good <radical>reason</radical> to <kanji>pluck</kanji> things. You pluck flowers out of the ground. You pluck a cat out of a tree. Why? Because you have fingers! That's your reason.
meaningInfo: Imagine using your fingers to pluck grapes and apples and other things, maybe non-fruit things.
readingMnemonic: Now that you have a reason to <kanji>pluck</kanji> things (you have fingers, after all) you decide you want to pluck all the fur off of <reading>Chew</reading>bacca (<ja>ちゅう</ja>). He is very furry, and you want to know what he looks like under there.
readingInfo: What reason could you have for wanting to pluck the fur off Chewbacca? Because you have fingers! So why not?!
